text: The Colombia national under-17 football team represents Colombia in the youth international team. They have been to the FIFA U-17 World Cup six times where they finished in the top four in the 2003 and 2009 tournaments. ==Competitive record== :*Draws include knockout matches decided on penalty kicks. :**Gold background colour indicates that the tournament was won. :***Red border colour indicates tournament was held on home soil.
